document.description: Our food looks and tastes unique, yet you'll find that the value and speed of service is very familiar. And, all of our bowls are made to order, just the way you like it.
document.body:
•Customer Relations• 1-800-576-8017 | Contact Info Yoshinoya America
Home Our Menu Locations Contact Us Franchise Bowler Club News HR Promotions
Putting fast food in a whole new place...a Bowl.
Yoshinoya's food is a combination of two cultures. It's traditional Japanese cuisine, served in an American fast food environment. Our food looks and tastes unique, yet you'll find that the value and speed of service is very familiar. And, all of our bowls are made to order, just the way you like it. Bowler Club Sign up today and get an exclusive Bowler Club discount for joining, a free gift on your birthday plus all of the latest news and special invites delivered straight to your inbox.
